text: The men's 200 metres event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 30 and 31 July 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| John Ertzgaard ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Christian Malcolm ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Stefan Holz ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 31 July Wind: -0.6 m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
